clusterList.phrase: we don't believe that changes in the clinical use of vytorin are warranted
we have to remember that the model is not the disease
conformity helps maintain these buffers against disease
we now have cells in culture that are genetically the same as in those with the disease
the ability to make those kinds of measurements will expand research into this type of host-pathogen interaction

what is clear is that by targeting an element involved directly in the infective process we may develop a line of drugs that work in collaboration with rather than in difference to the host environment including host immune responses
hopefully this kind of approach can help solve the ongoing problem of bacterial drug resistance
